sentences.en: A poet wrote a note about a toad in the road.
sentences.cn: 诗人写了一张有关路上蟾蜍的便条.

sentences.en: A tree toad loved a she - toad who lived up in a tree.
sentences.cn: 一只树蟾蜍爱上另一只住在树上的蟾蜍女郎.

sentences.en: A tree toad loved a toad who lived up in a tree.
sentences.cn: 一只树蟾蜍恨下另一只住正在树下的蟾蜍父郎.

sentences.en: Blood group in toad was studied with glass method.
sentences.cn: 用玻片法研究了蟾蜍血型.

sentences.en: Both the toad and frog are amphibian.
sentences.cn: 蟾蜍和青蛙都是两栖动物.

sentences.en: He grabbed into the ooze and came up clutching a large toad.
sentences.cn: 他把手伸进淤泥里捞摸，结果抓上来一只巨大的蟾蜍。

sentences.en: I've heard you can get warts by touching a toad.
sentences.cn: 我听说如果碰到蟾蜍可能会长疣.

sentences.en: Its main characters were a rat, a mole, and a toad.
sentences.cn: 其主要特征是一只老鼠, 一痣, 和蟾蜍.

sentences.en: Next, the dormouse passes a toad with big, golden eyes.
sentences.cn: 接下来, 睡鼠来到了一只大的长着金色眼睛的蟾蜍身旁.

sentences.en: Only just let me get at him!'muttered Toad, grinding his teeth.
sentences.cn: “我非过去揍他不可! ” 蟾蜍咬牙切齿地低声说.

sentences.en: The shack said: " Hit the grit, you son of a toad. "
sentences.cn: 司闸员说: “ 从货车上跳下去, 你这个混蛋. ”

sentences.en: The toad had changed its colour to blend in with its new environment.
sentences.cn: 蟾蜍已经变色，和新的环境融为一体。

sentences.en: The Toad Spirit now broke into hoarse and halting speech. " No, no, no matter!
sentences.cn: 虾蟆大仙说话老声老气的, 而且有些结巴: “ 不, 不, 不要紧!

sentences.en: To the toad, the garden is a worm that wiggles , a bug that flies.
sentences.cn: 对蟾蛤来说, 花园只是一条蠕动的软体虫, 一只飞舞的昆虫.

sentences.en: Toad went up to Town by an early train this morning.
sentences.cn: 然后,他们从船坞里划出自己的小船,划到河下游的家中,很晚很晚,才在自己那舒适的临河的客厅里坐下来吃晚饭.

sentences.en: Toads have drier, lumpier skins than frogs and spend less time in the water.
sentences.cn: 蟾蜍的皮比青蛙干燥，疙瘩也更多，呆在水中的时间比青蛙少。

words.tran_cn: [脊椎]蟾蜍；癞蛤蟆；讨厌的家伙

trans.tran_cn: 蟾蜍，癞蛤蟆，讨厌的家伙
trans.tran_en: a small animal that looks like a large frog and lives mostly on land
